query:
SELECT m.id, m.name, m.slug, m.description, m.order, d.name as discipline_name
FROM modules m
JOIN disciplines d ON m.disciplineId = d.id
WHERE d.slug = 'aritmetica'
ORDER BY m.order;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3791tceNk2iYTis.4402e8216d86 --database T5Ee3HJGcPdFeU4iAe9r9p --execute 
SELECT m.id, m.name, m.slug, m.description, m.order, d.name as discipline_name
FROM modules m
JOIN disciplines d ON m.disciplineId = d.id
WHERE d.slug = 'aritmetica'
ORDER BY m.order;
